charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(1-2)
21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP for a term of SIXTY (60) MONTHS as to each of Counts 1 and 2, to be served concurrently, for a total of SIXTY (60) MONTHS. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of THREE (3) YEARS as to each of Counts 1 and 2, to be served concurrently, for a total of THREE (3) YEARS. Special Assessment $200. Upon release from the custody of the Bureau of Prisons, the defendant is to be turned over to a duly authorized immigration official for appropriate removal proceedings from the United States.

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP for a term of SIXTY (60) MONTHS as to each of Counts 1 and 2, to be served concurrently, for a total of SIXTY (60) MONTHS. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of THREE (3) YEARS as to each of Counts 1 and 2, to be served concurrently, for a total of THREE (3) YEARS. Special Assessment $200. Upon release from the custody of the Bureau of Prisons, the defendant is to be turned over to a duly authorized immigration official for appropriate removal proceedings from the United States.
